title: 06/02/21 DPS Hour 3 Chris Mannix and Bill Oram
itunes:title: 06/02/21 DPS Hour 3 Chris Mannix and Bill Oram
description:
Chris Mannix talks to Dan about the changes going on in Boston. Chris says this has been in the works for a while and that news is not new. Bill Oram tells Dan that we will now find out how bad the Lakers want this.
